data.meta_description: CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research, is one of the worldâ€™s largest and most respected centres for scientific research. Its business is fundamental physics, finding out what the Universe is made of and how it works.
data.text:
CERN

At CERN, we probe the fundamental structure of particles that make up everything around us. We do so using the world's largest and most complex scientific instruments.

Know more

Science

The research programme at CERN covers topics from kaons to cosmic rays, and from the Standard Model to supersymmetry

Know more
